Article_Info.Title: The dual pattern of corticothalamic projection of the primary auditory cortex in macaque monkey

Experimental_Subjects.Source_Description: The reciprocal projections between A1 and the thalamus were assessed in a macaque monkey (Macaca mulatta; 8 kg body weight).

Injection.InjectionSite_by_Author: A1
Injection.Text_Description_of_InjectionSite: Using a syringe (Hamilton; 10 ml), a total volume of 2 ml of BDA (5% in saline) was injected in A1.

Injection_Coverage_by_Author.Text_Description: Transposed to the atlas of the monkey brain [11], the injection site extends between the stereotaxic rostrocaudal coordinates 6.3â€“9.5 mm, in the auditory koniocortex (areas AKL and AKM). The injection site is thus restricted to the area A1, located between the rostrocaudal coordinates 4 and 14 mm [5].

Article_Info.Title: HRP studies on thalamocortical neurons related to the cerebellocerebral projection in the monkey

Experimental_Subjects.Source_Description: This study was carried out in 7 monkeys (6 Macaca fuscata and 1 Macaca mulatta).

Injection.InjectionSite_by_Author: the medial part of motor cortex (hindlimb area)
Injection.Text_Description_of_InjectionSite: Fig. 1. Left uppermost diagram shows the injection site of HRP in the medial part of motor cortex (hindlimb area) in an upper view of the left hemisphere.

Injection_Coverage_by_Author.Text_Description: In avoiding spread of HRP solution over other cortical areas, we injected in the middle part of each area. â€¦ In each injection site, HRP reaction products were abundant both in the cortex and in the immediately adjacent white matter. But HRP reaction products scarcely spread over other cortical areas, which was confirmed by making serial sections of the injection site.

Injection.Text_Description_of_InjectionSite: Fig. 2. Retrogradely labelled cells in VLc, VPLo, VPLc, VLPs and LP, and in Pcn, CI, CM, Csl, MDdc, Pulo and Pulm are illustrated by dots, and anterogradely labelled terminals in VLc, LP, Pulo and Pulm by vertical lines after HRP injection in the area 5 as marked in the left u~spermost diagram.

Injection_Coverage_by_Author.Text_Description: In avoiding spread of HRP solution over other cortical areas, we injected in the middle part of each area. â€¦ In each injection site, HRP reaction products were abundant both in the cortex and in the immediately adjacent white matter. But HRP reaction products scarcely spread over other cortical areas, which was confirmed by making serial sections of the injection site.

Injection.InjectionSite_by_Author: the lateral part of precentral motor area (forelimb area)
Injection.Text_Description_of_InjectionSite: Retrogradely labelled cells in the intermediate segments of VLo, VPLo and VLc, and in CI, MDmf, MDdc and CM are illustrated by dots, and anterogradely labelled terminals in CM, CI, MDpc and MDmf by vertical lines after HRP injection in the lateral part of precentral motor area (forelimb area) as shown in the left uppermost diagram.

Injection_Coverage_by_Author.Text_Description: In avoiding spread of HRP solution over other cortical areas, we injected in the middle part of each area. â€¦ In each injection site, HRP reaction products were abundant both in the cortex and in the immediately adjacent white matter. But HRP reaction products scarcely spread over other cortical areas, which was confirmed by making serial sections of the injection site.

Injection.InjectionSite_by_Author: the lateral part of area 6
Injection.Text_Description_of_InjectionSite: Fig. 4. Retrogradely labelled cells in VA, VLo, VLc and VLps, and in X, Pcn, CM, Cdc, Csl, MDpc and MDdc are illustrated by dots, and anterogradely labelled terminals in several thalamic areas by vertical lines after HRP injection in the lateral part of area 6 as â€¢ marked in the left uppermost diagram.

Injection_Coverage_by_Author.Text_Description: In avoiding spread of HRP solution over other cortical areas, we injected in the middle part of each area. â€¦ In each injection site, HRP reaction products were abundant both in the cortex and in the immediately adjacent white matter. But HRP reaction products scarcely spread over other cortical areas, which was confirmed by making serial sections of the injection site.

Injection.InjectionSite_by_Author: the border region of cortical areas 6 and 9
Injection.Text_Description_of_InjectionSite: Fig. 5. Retrogradely labelled cells in VLc and VLps, and in X, VAmc, AM, Pcn, Cdc, Csl, MDpc, MDmf, MDdc and Li are illustrated by dots, and anterogradely labelled terminals in several thalamic areas by vertical lines after HRP injection into the border region of cortical areas 6 and 9 as illustrated in the left uppermost diagram.

Injection_Coverage_by_Author.Text_Description: In avoiding spread of HRP solution over other cortical areas, we injected in the middle part of each area. â€¦ In each injection site, HRP reaction products were abundant both in the cortex and in the immediately adjacent white matter. But HRP reaction products scarcely spread over other cortical areas, which was confirmed by making serial sections of the injection site.

Article_Info.Title: Thalamic Relay Nuclei of the Basal Ganglia Form Both Reciprocal and Nonreciprocal Cortical Connections, Linking Multiple Frontal Cortical Areas

Experimental_Subjects.Source_Description: Surgery and tissue preparation. Twenty adult macaque monkeys (Macaca nemestrina) were used for these tracing experiments.

Article_Info.Title: Thalamocortical and the dual pattern of corticothalamic projections of the posterior parietal cortex in macaque monkeys

Experimental_Subjects.Source_Description: The present study was conducted on two adult macaque monkeys (one Macaca mulatta and one Macaca fascicularis), 3 and 4 years old and weighing 3 and 4 kg.

Injection.InjectionSite_by_Author: PE
Injection.Text_Description_of_InjectionSite: After BDA injection in area PE (MK1, Fig. 3; Fig. 5G and H), the main CT projection formed by small endings terminated in lateral posterior nucleus (LP), VPL and PuM.

Injection_Coverage_by_Author.Text_Description: NA

Injection.InjectionSite_by_Author: PEa
Injection.Text_Description_of_InjectionSite: Fig. 3. Distribution of anterograde (small and giant CT endings) and retrograde (TC neurons) labeling in the thalamus, after injections of BDA (open black circles) and FR (open red squares) in areas PE and PEa

Injection_Coverage_by_Author.Text_Description: NA

Injection.InjectionSite_by_Author: PEa
Injection.Text_Description_of_InjectionSite: Fig. 4. Distribution of anterograde (small and giant CT endings) and retrograde (TC neurons) labeling in MK2 in the thalamus after injections of WGA (open black circles) and BDA (open red squares) in areas PE and PEa, respectively.

Injection_Coverage_by_Author.Text_Description: NA

Injection.InjectionSite_by_Author: PE
Injection.Text_Description_of_InjectionSite: To be recorded

Injection_Coverage_by_Author.Text_Description: NA

Article_Info.Title: Thalamocortical Connections of Parietal Somatosensory Cortical Fields in Macaque Monkeys are Highly Divergent and Convergent

Experimental_Subjects.Source_Description: Thalamocortical connections of areas 3a, 3b, 1, 2, and 5 were examined in 8 macaque monkeys (7 Macaca mulatta and 1 Macaca radiata)
